services.title: Fast Fiber
services.description: Enjoy a super-fast internet connection with our pure fiber-optic network, perfect for streaming, gaming, and working.

services.title: Better Wi-Fi
services.description: Our powerful routers give you strong Wi-Fi in every corner of your home or office, so all your devices stay connected.

services.title: Business Plans
services.description: Get dedicated internet for your company, with reliable service and features to help your business grow.

services.title: 24/7 Support
services.description: Our friendly support team is always here to help. If you have a problem, we'll get you back online quickly.

faq.question: What is fiber internet?
faq.answer: Fiber internet uses light to send data through tiny glass wires. It's much faster and more reliable than old internet connections like cable or DSL.

faq.question: How long does installation take?
faq.answer: A standard installation usually takes 2-4 hours. Our technician will set everything up and make sure it works perfectly before they leave.

faq.question: Can I use my own router?
faq.answer: Yes, you can. However, we recommend using the router we provide to get the best speed and performance from our network.

faq.question: Do you have data limits?
faq.answer: No. All our plans have unlimited data. You can stream, work, and play as much as you want without extra fees.

faq.question: How do I know if I can get SOON internet?
faq.answer: Check your address on our website or give us a call. We're always expanding, so we might be in your area soon!

contact.address: Makka Al Mukarama Road, Mogadishu, Somalia
